casebody.data:
CAPPS
v.
NW SIGN INDUSTRIES et al. No. 383A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 13, 2006. David P. Ferrell, Raleigh, Norman W. Shearin, Jr., Kitty Hawk, for NW Sign Industries, et al. Richard B. Fennell, Charlotte, for Alan Capps. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of February 2006 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Appeal: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of February 2006." Justice MARTIN recused.
